Get an indicative price for a transaction

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"apiKey","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Your Public API key."},{"name":"sellToken","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The ERC20 token address of the token you want to sell."},{"name":"buyToken","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The ERC20 token address of the token you want to receive."},{"name":"sellAmount","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The amount of sellToken (in sellToken base units) you want to send."},{"name":"buyAmount","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The amount of buyToken (in buyToken base units) you want to receive."},{"name":"slippagePercentage","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The maximum acceptable slippage percentage."},{"name":"gasPrice","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The target gas price for the swap transaction."},{"name":"takerAddress","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The address which will fill the quote."},{"name":"excludedSources","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Liquidity sources to exclude from the quote."},{"name":"includedSources","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Liquidity sources to include in the quote."},{"name":"skipValidation","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Skip validation of the quote."},{"name":"feeRecipient","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The address that should receive affiliate fees."},{"name":"buyTokenPercentageFee","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The percentage of the buyAmount attributed as affiliate fees."},{"name":"enableSlippageProtection","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"Enable slippage protection."},{"name":"priceImpactProtectionPercentage","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Allowed price impact percentage."},{"name":"feeRecipientTradeSurplus","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"The recipient address of any trade surplus fees."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Indicative price for the transaction","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"price":{"type":"string","description":"Price of buyToken in sellToken and vice versa."},"grossPrice":{"type":"string","description":"Price with fees removed."},"estimatedPriceImpact":{"type":"string","description":"Estimated change in price due to price impact."},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Amount of ether (in wei) to be sent with the transaction."},"gasPrice":{"type":"string","description":"Gas price (in wei) for the transaction."},"gas":{"type":"string","description":"Estimated gas limit for the transaction."},"estimatedGas":{"type":"string","description":"Estimate of the actual gas used in the transaction."},"protocolFee":{"type":"string","description":"Maximum ether paid towards the protocol fee (in wei)."},"minimumProtocolFee":{"type":"string","description":"Minimum ether paid towards the protocol fee (in wei)."},"buyAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Amount of buyToken that would be bought in this swap."},"grossBuyAmount":{"type":"string","description":"BuyAmount with fees removed."},"sellAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Amount of sellToken that would be sold in this swap."},"grossSellAmount":{"type":"string","description":"SellAmount with fees removed."},"sources":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"proportion":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Distribution of buyAmount or sellAmount between liquidity sources."},"buyTokenAddress":{"type":"string","description":"ERC20 token address of the token you want to receive."},"sellTokenAddress":{"type":"string","description":"ERC20 token address of the token you want to sell."},"allowanceTarget":{"type":"string","description":"Target contract address for which the user needs to have an allowance."},"sellTokenToEthRate":{"type":"string","description":"Rate between ETH and sellToken."},"buyTokenToEthRate":{"type":"string","description":"Rate between ETH and buyToken."},"expectedSlippage":{"type":"string","description":"Expected slippage used in routing calculations for the quote."},"fees":{"type":"object","properties":{"zeroExFee":{"type":"object","properties":{"feeType":{"type":"string"},"feeToken":{"type":"string"},"feeAmount":{"type":"string"},"billingType":{"type":"string"}}}},"description":"Fees that would be charged, including 0x fee details."}},"title":"V2TransactionPriceDetails"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request, possibly due to missing or invalid parameters","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"},"code":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"V2Error"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized, possibly due to missing or invalid API key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"},"code":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"V2Error"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
